alert.note: Alert for Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 4:14AM CDT until June 15 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Eastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Northwestern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Western Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Clay County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Early County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 615 AM EDT/515 AM CDT/. * At 514 AM EDT/414 AM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Richards Crossroads to 6 miles north of Midland City to near Enterprise, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Cottonwood, Fort Gaines, Blakely, Graceville, Dothan, Headland, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Arlington, Webb, Columbia, Pinckard, Centerville and Malone. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
